dialogue_before: Welcome to the Iron Coliseum. Build your first bot and prove yourself.
dialogue_after: Not bad. You've earned your license. Tougher fights await.

dialogue_before: The Scrapyard Ring. Two opponents this time. Bring your best.
dialogue_after: Solid work. Tier 2 parts are now available in the shop.

dialogue_before: The Minefield. Watch your step. Mines don't care whose side you're on.
dialogue_after: Champion of the qualifying rounds. The real tournament begins soon.
